name: Evamp & Saanga
description: Evamp & Saanga is a leading developer of Web, Mobile, and Telecom related applications and solutions in the Middle East and Pakistan. Our company was established in 2001, with a focus towards design and development of innovative solutions for this converging market of Web, Mobile, and Telecom. In addition to our own product development, we offer custom development services and system integration for clients.

locations.address: Lower Ground Floor, Rehmat Plaza Street 1, Sector F-8/3
